bibl.title: Sirus Rising: Commemorating the Anniversary of the Sothic Cycle.
San. Journal of the Society for Ancient Numismatics

bibl.note: À propos de la commémoration numismatique de la fin du cycle sothiaque en l'an 2 d'Antonin le Pieux. - Non vidimus. Cf. NL 135 (1996) p. 64, No. 383.
MOLNAR Michael R., Sirus Rising: Commemorating the Anniversary of the Sothic Cycle.
San. Journal of the Society for Ancient Numismatics 19, No. 1 (1995) pp. 15-18.
